content: I've been thinking about writing a series of short stories that explore different gender identities and expressions, and how they intersect with other aspects of identity like race, class, and sexuality. I want to create characters that are nuanced and complex, and that reflect the diversity of human experience. I've also been considering starting a blog or online platform where I can share my writing and thoughts on gender, identity, and social justice. I think this could be a great way to raise awareness and promote inclusivity, while also providing a space for people to share their own stories and experiences.
